subject: [YouTrack, Resolved] Issue codio-6399: Students starting units sometimes get the wrong stack
text:
Bug was updated by Vasiliy Levykin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:17.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6399 >codio-6399< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6399 > Students starting units sometimes get the wrong stack Created by Ian Jobling  
a: see TheUnit.png showing the stack that this unit was assigned                                                                                                                                                
b: see teachers_student list.png showing that this student is member of the class and has started the unit in the correct way                                                                                   
b: also see teachers_student list.png showing that other students who have also done the same thing have answered challenges (ie have the correct stack)                                                        
c: see StudentsClass.png showing that the student is member of the class and running other units in the Course has been given the correct stack on those occassions                                             
d: see studentsproject.png showing that his box has the wrong stack

html:
Bug was updated by Vasiliy Levykin in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 07:17.

codio-6399 Students starting units sometimes get the wrong stack Created by Ian Jobling
a: see TheUnit.png showing the stack that this unit was assigned
b: see teachers_student list.png showing that this student is member of the class and has started the unit in the correct way
b: also see teachers_student list.png showing that other students who have also done the same thing have answered challenges (ie have the correct stack)
c: see StudentsClass.png showing that the student is member of the class and running other units in the Course has been given the correct stack on those occassions
d: see studentsproject.png showing that his box has the wrong stack
